Ref: mod_jk lb worker

Please change the WAIT_BEFORE_RECOVER and ADDITINAL_WAIT_LOAD macros 
(jk_lb_worker.c) into parameters in the worker configuration.

(As an aside, a management API [socket based?] for the jk connectors / workers 
would be nice to allow reconfiguration, control or monitoring at runtime.)
